learningPaths.title: Google Cloud Platform Learning Path
learningPaths.briefDescription: Master the fundamentals of Google Cloud Platform and build scalable applications.

learningPath.topicBrief: Understand the core concepts of Google Cloud Platform (GCP), including its architecture, services, and pricing models.
Learn how to create, manage, and scale virtual machines on GCP.
Build and deploy scalable web applications without managing servers.
Store and manage data in the cloud with various storage options.
Manage relational databases on GCP.
Analyze large datasets with a fully managed serverless data warehouse.
Build and connect cloud services with serverless functions.
Deploy and manage containerized applications on GCP.
Build and manage data pipelines for batch and stream processing.
Build real-time data pipelines and messaging systems.

learningPaths.title: Gemini AI Learning Path
learningPaths.briefDescription: Explore the essentials of Gemini AI and how to implement it in various applications.

learningPath.topicBrief: Learn the basics of Gemini AI, its architecture, and core concepts.

learningPath.topicTitle: Getting Started with Gemini AI API
learningPath.topicBrief: Understand how to interact with the Gemini AI API, including authentication and basic API calls.
Explore how to build and train models using the Gemini AI platform.
Learn how to deploy and manage your trained models in a production environment.
Integrate Gemini AI models and services into your existing applications.
Discover advanced features and functionalities of Gemini AI to enhance your applications.

learningPath.topicTitle: Monitoring and Maintaining Gemini AI Models
learningPath.topicBrief: Learn how to monitor and maintain the performance of your deployed models.
Understand best practices for securing your models and data while using Gemini AI.
Explore various use cases and applications of Gemini AI in real-world scenarios.
Access resources, community support, and help for any issues or questions related to Gemini AI.
